Detailed Description

I am currently in a bind and to get this working quickly, I am abusing the format to handle metals as well. In the case of metals we do NOT have neighbor atom or an initial cap cutting plane (metals are modeled as not having a prefered direction). However, we do desire to keep the method transformation invariant; to do this we put the closest atom to the metal as the C_nbr_atom and the 2nd closest as the 2nd nbr atom (this is confusing but quick & dirty).
